name: Fearsome Expressions Quiz / Test | Languages | 5 Questions

questions.explanation:
ruinous legacy.

	Many a runinous legacy has been passed on from one generation to the next...will America's be the federal budget deficit?

from the depths.

	These are the first words of Psalm 29.  Oscar Wilde used 'De Profundis' as a title to an essay!

thing much desired.

	Desideratum is pronounced di-ZID-uhr-AI-tuhm or di-ZID-uhr-AH-tuhm.  The plural is desderata...

Carthage must be destroyed.

	This famous saying was repeated after every speech by the famed Roman politician and orator Cato (the elder).  Eventually...Carthage was detroyed.

golden mean.

	The golden mean was preached by Aristotle, and is a concept to be found in philosophies around the world.
